channel.title: Help For my SERVER! pls
channel.description:
good i have a server and all
I dont no how to let ppl on it....or i dont no how to stop the ::commonds like ::barrows and that stuff i dont want it in my server!
i want to have like ::male ::female and stuff like that and all but...how can i make my own commonds?? if eny 1 can help me all i can say is !!TY!! Have a nice day and help me have 1 to :D

item.title: Help For my SERVER! pls
item.dc:creator: @PussyCrunch PussyCrunch
item.description:
@PussyCrunch wrote:

If you want to stop everyone but you from doing those commands like barrows find the code…

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("barrows")) { addItem(4716, 1); addItem(4718, 1); addItem(4720, 1); addItem(4722, 1); addItem(4708, 1); addItem(4710, 1); addItem(4712, 1); addItem(4714, 1); addItem(4753, 1); addItem(4755, 1); addItem(4757, 1); addItem(4759, 1); addItem(4745, 1); addItem(4747, 1); addItem(4749, 1); addItem(4751, 1); addItem(4732, 1); addItem(4734, 1); addItem(4736, 1); addItem(4738, 1); addItem(4726, 1); addItem(4728, 1); addItem(4730, 1); addItem(4724, 1); }

And put && playerRights >= 3)

at the end of code)[/code]

So it will be like…

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("barrows") && playerRights >= 3) { addItem(4716, 1); addItem(4718, 1); addItem(4720, 1); addItem(4722, 1); addItem(4708, 1); addItem(4710, 1); addItem(4712, 1); addItem(4714, 1); addItem(4753, 1); addItem(4755, 1); addItem(4757, 1); addItem(4759, 1); addItem(4745, 1); addItem(4747, 1); addItem(4749, 1); addItem(4751, 1); addItem(4732, 1); addItem(4734, 1); addItem(4736, 1); addItem(4738, 1); addItem(4726, 1); addItem(4728, 1); addItem(4730, 1); addItem(4724, 1); }

So now only administrator can do it. Do that will all the codes you want it be disabled.[br][size=1]Posted at: August 29, 2006, 10:12:31 PM[/size][hr]And for ::male and ::female… just add

else if (command.startsWith("male")) { pHead=1; pBeard=10; pTorso=18; pArms=26; pHands=33; pLegs=36; pFeet=42; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

And

if (command.startsWith("female")) { sendMessage("You're now a girl..."); pHead=50; pTorso=57; pArms=62; pHands=68; pLegs=72; pFeet=80; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

Read full topic
